duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform animal husbandry tasks including animal room checks, cleaning, and sanitation.
Conduct technical tasks such as tumor measurements, weaning, tail clipping, and euthanizing mice.
Perform technical procedures including injections, oral gavage, and bleeds.
Document results in a lab notebook and maintain animal colony database.
Ensure work is conducted in accordance with animal health and welfare policies and safety programs.
Lead the team when supervisor is absent and work flexible hours including weekends and holidays.

education_certification.credential: Associate degree in Life Sciences or Veterinary Technology
